revised_title: Observations on Tides in the Irish Sea and Tidal Phenomena of the Irish and English Channels
tldr: The author reports on observations made on tides in the Irish Sea and the similarities of tidal phenomena in the Irish and English Channels. The study reveals that the turn of the stream is simultaneous, and the times of high and low water at Morecambe Bay can determine the hour when the stream of either tide will commence or terminate.
